Title: Nice basic camera
Cons: None yet but I haven't experimented with too many motion shots.
Pros: Very long battery life.  Easy navigation between modes.  The screen displays a small description of the mode so you don't have to just go by the small picture.  Shoots pretty decent video with sound.
Comments: Nice intermediate or starter digital camera.  Great for the price.  As with most cameras you need to add more storage.

Title: Overall - excellent!
Cons: Instead of a soft LCD screen, it has a hard plastic over the LCD screen which causes it to scratch very easily. Also, the review button is a bit cumbersome - small and up in the corner next to the tiny optical viewfinder. However I got used to it very quickly after using it a few times.
Pros: Excellent battery life, super-fast start-up time! Shot over 300 pictures at a wedding and didnt even use half the battery life. HUGE display at 2.5"! Manual features appreciated - great user interface describes what each mode is used for. Video works well with good quality.
Comments: I have suggested this digital camera to many other people. Sony has been in this market for a while and has seemed to work out many kinks of previous models. Other than the easily-scratched screen, it is very simple to use with GREAT battery life and FAST speeds!

Title: Great value
Cons: I found the ISO 1000 totally useless.
Pros: Very happy about this camera. Nice colors, sharp pictures. Excellent features for this price.

Cons: The camera has too low of a shooting speed. I took it to a collegiate track meet and found a lot of the photos blurry. Other times I'd attempt to take a shot of someone running but the camera took too long to shot.
Pros: Doesn't cost much, has a sleek and small design.

Title: Great Camera!
Cons:
- Proprietary flash memory format
- Play button for viewing pictures is small and difficult to press.
Pros:
- Compact
- Easy to use
- Rechargable battery
- Long battery life
- Great picture quality
- Large LCD display

Title: no feel happy with sony item now
Cons: just not feel good about this camera. might spend more money to get a canon.
Pros: no

Title: Excellent point and shoot ultraslim
Cons: Big screen means more prone to scratches, 32mb isn't enough so that means buying a memory stick, lag when flash is on, rotary dial gets out of position easily, highest video quality needs a big memory stick, ISO 1000 has too much noise, memory stick/battery slot is on the weaker side, plastic build may feel cheap at times, the playback button is above the screen, making it common to smudge your thumb all over the screen
Pros: Ultra-slim design, 2.5 LCD screen, 32mb built-in memory, up to ISO 1000, fast start up time, looks great, built-in menus are good for those unknown image settings (on the rotary dial), image quality, optical viewfinder,  also good for videos
Comments:
This is a great ultra-slim point-and-shoot camera, its aimed for the novice-intermediate consumers, the camera is cheap ($) for its screen size and image quality, most of the problems are build quality, though can be overlooked.
The output jack is a custom jack,  meaning that third party cables probably wouldn't work, limiting your choice of outputting to the included RCA AV cable.

Title: Nice camera
Cons: The only thing that irritates me about the camera is memory stick/battery slot. The cover is so flimsy, I'm afraid I'm going break it every time I open it.
Pros:
This camera is pretty nice. The quality of the photos is excellent (I'd hope so for a 6mp camera), and the camera itself is sleek in design. Light weight, small dimensions.. you get the gist.

I purchased a 2gb Memory Stick Pro DUO which holds around 370 compressed, 6mp pictures.
Comments: The camera shipped in 1 day. I was a little suprised.

Title: Not that great
Cons: I have only had this two months and it is already broken.
Pros: Cheap

Title: Great pics, so so focusing
Cons: I find the focusing is quite slow and sometimes does not focus even in decent lighting.  The focus lamp helps but not always.
Pros: great picture quality, colors, LCD.  All the basic stuff is good.
